question: Which of the following correctly uses indexing? Assume that a is a list or string.

answers.feedback: No, due to the way the code was written it creates a list. This list would have one element which is the value assigned to the variable a.
Though this tries to use indexing, it does not specify what element should be taken from a.
No, this is an example of creating a list that contains single element 8
Yes, this will using indexing to get the value of the first element of a.
